00055 #define ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_OK                  ( ECODE_OK )                             ///< Success return value.
00056 #define ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_PARAM_ERROR         ( ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_BASE | 0x00000001 ) ///< Illegal input parameter.
00057 #define ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_NOT_INITIALIZED     ( ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_BASE | 0x00000002 ) ///< DMA is not initialized.
00058 #define ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_ALREADY_INITIALIZED ( ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_BASE | 0x00000003 ) ///< DMA has already been initialized.
00059 #define ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_CHANNELS_EXHAUSTED  ( ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_BASE | 0x00000004 ) ///< No DMA channels available.
00060 #define ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_IN_USE              ( ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_BASE | 0x00000005 ) ///< DMA is in use.
00061 #define ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_ALREADY_FREED       ( ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_BASE | 0x00000006 ) ///< DMA channel was free.
00062 #define ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_CH_NOT_ALLOCATED    ( ECODE_EMDRV_DMADRV_BASE | 0x00000007 ) ///< The channel is not reserved.
